name: puma-health-system
description: PRISM Health Intelligent Health Monitoring System - Full Stack

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.start: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
